description: Jake Waring, 20, admitted visiting the fast food restaurant two days after arriving on the Isle of Man.
title: Coronavirus: Man jailed for going to McDonald's while self-isolating
title_page: Coronavirus: Man jailed for going to McDonald's while self-isolating - BBC News
maintext: His actions had "posed a very real risk" to those he had come into contact with and the sentence would send a "clear message" that anyone breaking the law would face jail, she added.
